List:
A new version is available on Itch!\nNew version: [[VERSION_MSG]]
Your family controls a fledgling settlement in a fertile valley. Grow your settlement, defend your lands, and defeat the other families. When a family has gained control over the entire map, everyone is rewarded Prestige based on their performance. This button is the best way to let me know what you think. It will send me logs, a screenshot, and whatever you write. This button shows your family tree. Nice. Settlements are made up of 'Commoners'. Tap the blue buttons to learn more. The command panel is how you can make changes to the settlement policies.
Serf Serfs Freemen Retinue Retinues
New Version Available
Oh, shit... My lord, the game has crashed. A bug report has been automatically created for you.\n\n\nThe game will now properly crash. Thank you.
Delete Data? Are you sure you want to delete ALL your game data?
Missing something?
What do I need to do right now? If you want something done right you need to do it yourself. [[CHARACTER_NAME]], I have a task for you. I need you to do something for me, [[CHARACTER_NAME]] What do you want from me, [[RELATIONSHIP]]? Hello [[RELATIONSHIP]]...\nHow can I be of service?
Brush We cannot build here until we clear this brush.\nIf only there was a way to clear brush...\n\n(...there isn't)
Is currently in [[SETTLEMENT_NAME]].
Serf Population This is the total number of Serfs in the settlement. Serfs are your direct servants, and the population will grow as long as there is room in a Cottage Crops Crops are planted by Serfs throughout the year. Crops are harvested in March and Octoboer, yielding Food. You need Food to feed your troops (Commoners can take care of themselves). Days In the Season This tells you the number of days left in the current season. Make sure you have enough farmers to plan enough crops to have a great harvest. Also, make sure you have enough farmers to harvest all the crops you planted! Support Job Serfs in the Support job perform construction, shuttle resources where they are needed, and... ahem... help the population grow faster. Farmer Job Serfs in the Farmer job are necessary to plant the crops and harvest the food. The greater the number of farmers, however, the slower the serf population and wealth level will grow.
Currently in [[SETTLEMENT_NAME]] Paid\n Next Payment in [[NEXT_PAYMENT]] days Last Payment [[LAST_PAYMENT]]\nDays Unpaid [[DAYS_UNPAID]] In Supply\n Next Supply in [[NEXT_SUPPLY]] days Last Supply [[LAST_SUPPLY]]\nDays OOS [[DAYS_OUT_OF_SUPPLY]] Morale Modifier [[MODIFIERS]]
Manor This is your house. The buck stops with you. Cottage Cottages provides homes for Serfs. Serfs will grow plant and grow Food on your lands Workshop Workshops create Tradesmen job. Tradesmen pay Coin every day to you in taxes Tavern A Tavern makes recruiting civilians easier
I will attempt to attract new [[COMMONER_TYPE]] to [[SETTLEMENT_NAME]]. I should report back in [[TIME_UNTIL_COMPLETE]] Attract commoners report I finished attracting [[COMMONER_TYPE]] after [[ELAPSED_DURATION]]. Growth: [[GROWTH_ADDED]] (Every 100 growth increases population)
Demolish demolition We can demolish buildings to make room for new ones. This will take time, however. What building do you want demolished? Demolition Demolish this building? It will cost [[DEMOLISH_COST_COIN]] Coin, and take [[TIME_UNTIL_COMPLETE]]
Construct construction We can construct new buildings to develop our settlements. Serfs can be assigned to a construction project to help complete it. Construction will take time and money, my lord. What building do you want constructed? Construction ( Disband disbanding We can disband companies we no longer require to return the troops to the population of the local settlement.
Raid raiding We can raid our enemies to destroy and plunder their resources! If their settlements is undefended we can capture it! A raid, huh? Who should feel the heat? We are eagerly awaiting to hear news from the raid.
We departed on [[DEPART_START]] We were detected! The defenders are upon us! They killed too many of us, lets get out of here! There's too many of them, lets get out of here! [[ROUTED_NAME]] tried to flee, but was killed. Failed in prephase We are carrying all the loot we can, lets get out of here I will raid [[SETTLENAME_NAME]]. Do you wish it? We raided [[SETTLEMENT_NAME]]. [[REPORT]] We drove the attacker off Buildings damaged [[RESPONDER_NAME]] detected the enemy at [[DETECTION_TIME]] [[ROUTED_NAME]] has fled the battle [[GARRISON_NAME]] has been destroyed The enemy broke off their attack - they had all the loot they could carry.
Move moving We can move our people between settlements that we control. Go capture some settlements! I can leave immediately. Where should I go?
Train training By training hard we will triumph in combat! We should not train for more than {0}, but a couple of days won't cut it either. How long should the training last? Longer training can be more effective, but everyone has their limit.
Deliver Food delivering food If one of our settlements is running out of Food, we can deliver it from a nearby settlement.
Each of us can lead their own contingent of troops. Troops can be militia, drafted from the commoners in a settlement, or professional warriors recruited from the free folk. Recruit Troops My lord, I will attempt to recruit [[TROOP_GOAL]] from [[SETTLEMENT_NAME]]. Based on my Leadership skill, I have a [[RECRUIT_CHANCE]]% chance when recruiting, and it should take me [[TIME_UNTIL_COMPLETE]] to complete this task. My lord, I will attempt to recruit [[TROOP_GOAL]] from [[SETTLEMENT_NAME]]. Based on my Leadership skill, I have a [[RECRUIT_CHANCE]]% chance when recruiting, and it should take me [[TIME_UNTIL_COMPLETE]] to complete this task. Goal:[[TROOP_GOAL]] ETA:[[TIME_UNTIL_COMPLETE]] Retinue Recruiting [[REPORT]]
Action not found I cannot stop that, its too late
There isn't a Serf cottage to sellc, my lord There isn't a Yeoman cottage to buy, my lord There aren't Serfs available to work there, my lord There aren't Mercenaries available here We do not have enough Coin We do not have enough Food
Building not found That building cannot accomodate any more workers That building does not have any workers
There is already a building there We cannot build there yet That is a friendly settlement, my lord! My lord! That settlement is not under our control.
I cannot take on another task at this moment! I am not in command of a company! I am *already* in command of a company!
The company is not free to perform this task at this moment
Cancel
Pay Mercs Unpaid mercenaries are not happy and will desert until nobody is left. Mercenaries will also 'pay themselves' from a succesful raid.
